My name is Cl√©ment, I'm 23 years old. 
 I live in Bordeaux and I am Software Developper. 
 I chose the OpenClassrooms, which specialises in the field of computer development in order to continue my studies in a sandwich course. 
 Not having been convinced by the work-study formats and the and the programme of the schools in my region, I want to continue in a framework offering more autonomy in order to obtain a RNCP level 6 qualification
